points.title: Airbnb will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after account deletion

case.title: This service will continue using anonymized user-generated content after erasure of personal information
case.localized_title: Airbnb continuera à utiliser des contenus anonymes générés par les utilisateurs même après la suppression de leur compte.
case.description: If you delete your account or your information from this service, user-generated content such as comments and posts will remain and still be used, but on a pseudonymized or anonymized form so that they can't be linked back to you.

points.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: You cannot delete your account of this service
points.analysis: You can not delete your account. You can only beg AirBnB to do it for you:  "If you want to permanently close and delete your account, contact us." In that case AirBnB will insist that you to provide further personal information to "We will verify your identity for security purposes before accepting the deletion request." which is up to them to accept or insist more proof for their records. So effectively, you can not delete your account from this service. This happened to me and the account still exists as I refused to keep sending them more and more documents just close the account while the original reason for closing the account was them violating my privacy.

case.title: You cannot delete your account of this service
case.localized_title: Vous ne pouvez pas supprimer votre compte de ce service
case.description: There is no way of deleting your account, which implies that data might be stored forever.

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

case.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
case.localized_title: Le service peut vendre ou transférer d'une autre manière vos données personnelles dans le cadre d'une procédure de faillite ou d'un autre type de transaction financière.
case.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

points.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

case.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
case.localized_title: Les pixels de suivi sont utilisés dans la communication entre les services et les utilisateurs.
case.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.

points.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

case.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
case.localized_title: Certaines données personnelles peuvent être conservées dans l'intérêt de l'entreprise ou pour répondre à des obligations légales.
case.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

case.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs qui ont été bannis de façon permanente de ce service ne sont pas autorisés à se réinscrire sous un nouveau compte.
case.description: Once users have been permanently banned from this service, they are not allowed to create a new account to keep using the service.

points.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

case.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
case.localized_title: Vous avez droit à un remboursement si certains seuils ou normes ne sont pas respectés par le service

points.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

case.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
case.localized_title: Vous vous engagez à ne pas utiliser le service à des fins illégales
case.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

points.title: 30 days of notice are given before closing your account

case.title: 30 days of notice are given before closing your account
case.localized_title: Un préavis de 30 jours est donné avant la fermeture du compte.
case.description: The Terms explain they will notify users at least 30 days before closing their accounts, which allows users to limit the losses and damages caused by this termination.

points.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

case.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
case.localized_title: Il n'est pas permis d'explorer le site, de le parcourir ou d'y accéder par des moyens automatisés.

points.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance

case.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance
case.localized_title: Lorsque le service souhaite apporter une modification substantielle à ses conditions, vous en êtes informé au moins 30 jours à l'avance.
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified at least 30 days in advance.

points.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance

case.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance
case.localized_title: Lorsque le service souhaite apporter une modification substantielle à ses conditions, vous en êtes informé au moins 30 jours à l'avance.
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified at least 30 days in advance.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service transmet vos données personnelles à des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

case.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles peuvent être divulguées pour répondre à des demandes gouvernementales sans que vous en soyez averti
case.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
